channel.title: [Aggroth] 317
channel.description:
[img]http://www.aggroth.uphero.com/img/title2/rslogo3.gif[/img] [font=verdana][size=12pt]This is my latest project, im currently working alone, and im working on a bish load of stuff, so please dont flame.[/size][/font]
[size=14pt]Progress:[/size]
The red color means the feature has not yet been started. The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction. The green color means the feature has been finished.
Client Features:
- Fast client - Autocache downloader - 377 Maps - 377 Items - 377 Anims/Gfx - 377 Gameframe - 377 Npcs - No customs
Server Features:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img]Prayer:
- All bones bury-able - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate -Zombie
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img] Agility:
- Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable - Force movement mask - Correct animations used - Run energy affected by weight and level, probably wont add
[img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img]Firemaking:
- Correct anims - Ashes - All logs lightable - Colored fires - Clipped - Can't light fires in Bank - Can click logs on the ground and light them
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img]Woodcutting:
- Stumps and regrowing trees - Correct hatchet finding - Correct hatchet animations - All trees cut-able - Correct fell chance algorithms - Birds nest falling out - Broken axe random event - Spirit Tree - Canoes
[img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img]Mining:
- Emptying and refilling rocks - All ores can be mined - Correct pickaxe finding and animations - Prospecting - Random chance of obtaining gems - Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms - Mining gems at shilo village - Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg) - Rock Golem
[img]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img]Fletching:
- All logs can be fletched - Correct interfaces - Fletch 5, 10, x, all
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img]Crafting:
- Gem cutting - Tanning - Spinning & Picking flax - Pottery - Jewelry Molding
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img] Thieving:
- Stall Thieving - NPC Thieving - Correct anims & gfx - Correct Respawn Times
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img]Fishing:
- All fishing spots - All fishes fishable - Correct equipment - Correct animations - Moving locations, probably not going to add
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img]Cooking:
- All fishes cookable - All meat cookable - Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews. - Cooking gauntlets - Correct anims & delays - Working interface with multiple amount options - Lumbridge cooking range bonus - Eating food - Wine
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img]Runecrafting:
- Altar Enterting - Tiaras - All Altars - Abyss
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img]Herblore:
- All potions makeable - Itentifying herbs - Weapon poisioning
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img]Smithing:
- All bars smithable - Smelting - Correct anims, working interfaces & objects
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HtjDm.gif[/img]Slayer:
- All Slayer Masters - All Slayer Monsters - Basic Slayer Gem - Slayer Points - Slayer Shop
To do:
-Farming, most of it -Adding a custom owner crown -Adding a custom developpers crown -Adding a custom moderator crown -Adding a custom administrator crown
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img]Combat:
-Project Insanity Combat with many fixes and Add-Ons. -Perfect Range Formula -Melee Max hit Formula Tweaked
Bosses:
-Big Wolf -Chaos Elemental -Count Draynor -Dagganoth Supreme -Dagganoth Rex -Dagganoth Prime -Giant Mole -Gunthor the Brave -Kalphite Queen -King Black Dragon -TzTok-Jad
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img]Minigames:
-Duel Arena -Castle Wars -Fight Caves -Barrows [color=green]-Fight Pits[/color] -Pest Control -Fishing Trawler -Gnome Ball -Bar crawl -Blast Furnace -Champion's Challenge -Chompy hunting -Games room -Jungle Clean Up -Pet Care -Rogue Trader -Rogue's Den -Splitbark Armour -Temple Trekking -Magic Training Arena
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080320193236/runescape/images/archive/3/37/20090906074416%21Lamp.png[/img]Random Events:
-Broken axe random -Bird Nests -Sand which Lady -Genie -Rock Golem) -Spirit Tree -Zombie -Evil Chicken
[img]http://i.imgur.com/KKQ7R.png[/img]Quests:
-Cook's Assistant -Romeo and Juliet -Witches Potion -Imp Catcher -Dorics Quest -Vampyre Slayer -Restless Ghost -Gertrude's Cat -Sheep Shearer -Rune Mysteries -Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)
Membership:
- Member objects - One time fee $ 7.50 dollars. - Members only teleports - Members items - Pre alpha/Beta will be free - Members/Non Members Skills
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QR4Lh.png[/img]Miscellaneous:
-97 % of runescape spawns includes (fish spots, all shops, all main cities, and more) -100 % of runescape shops (111 shops loaded) -99.9 % of dupes fixed (If there are any left they will be fixed asap) -90 % + all skills to be done -99 % of runescape foods added -97 % of all doors around the world (Will be adding the rest when found) -99 % potions (All should be added may be missing one or two) -95 % runescape drops (Will find bugs in beta testing phase) -All guilds openable with requirements -Wilderness warning sign -Normal and Ancient Magics (No lunars because it wasn't in 2006) -Exact Runescape Teleports (Gives exp, requires runes, requires levels, misc teleport, requires member for ancients and some moderns, and more...) -Old Runescape Starter -Runescape price rip -Adding Quests Exactly like Runescape -Report Abuse -Runescape like Sailing with all locations -Full Gnome Glider Transportation -Bank Pins -Christmas Crackers -Fully Functional Teletabs -Full Pickables (Cabbage, Flax, Wheat, Onions, Potato, Etc...) -Full Weapon Poisioning -Many, May, Bugs fixed -Add or Drop Item Function (If you don't have enough room it goes on the ground) -Chat Filtering System -Fully Functional 99 % Skill Guides -Hostname Blacklist Implemented -Al Kharid Gates and Shantay Pass -Running with Energy (Will have weight soon) -Runescape Combat Exp Rates -Magic Carpet -Ladder System -Rings that will be ingame (Dueling, Wealth, Recoil) (Life) -Amulets that will be ingame (Glory, Games Necklace, Ghostspeak Amulet) -Clue scrolls (Tons of scrolls loaded) -Hide Tanning -Canoes -Music Player -Teletabs -Looping animations added (Don't stop half way through) -Random Events -Crystal Chest -Flax Stringing -Aubury -Clipped Npcs (Walking, Following) (Attacking) -Clipped Following -Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc) - Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc) - Perfect Magic Enchanting added - Al Kharid Desert Added - Great Membership system Countdown/Members/Non members Items - Teleporting to Zanaris with Dramen staff in Inventory or equipped - Pets System Added - Global Drops
More soon to come!

Welcome to the club!

P.S. Loveandpower doesn’t flame in every post. They’ve given me a lot of positive feedback in the past.[/quote]

item.title: [Aggroth] 317
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Coldmedicine, post:8, topic:523961”]Mrs/mr flame.

Every freaking post youve ever made is a flame.[/quote]You obviously don’t know me very well…I doubt all 10k posts of mine are flame. It’s true though there are several features you are advertising in the project thread that are not in the source itself. It makes me wonder what you honestly did.

I’m not being mean about it I just don’t like people who mislead others. If you really and truly did these features you shouldn’t have a problem providing these details.

Read full topic

item.title: [Aggroth] 317
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:


[font=verdana][size=12pt]This is my latest project, im currently working alone, and im working on a bish load of stuff, so please dont flame.[/size][/font]

[size=14pt]Progress:[/size]

The red color means the feature has not yet been started.
The orange color means the feature has been started and is under construction.
The green color means the feature has been finished.

Client Features:

  • Fast client
  • Autocache downloader
  • 377 Maps
  • 377 Items
  • 377 Anims/Gfx
  • 377 Gameframe
  • 377 Npcs
  • No customs

Server Features:

Prayer:

  • All bones bury-able
  • Every prayer working properly
  • Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
    -Zombie

Agility:

  • Gnome, Brimhaven, and Wilderness, Pyramid, Werewolf courses usable
  • Force movement mask
  • Correct animations used
  • Run energy affected by weight and level, probably wont add

Firemaking:

  • Correct anims
  • Ashes
  • All logs lightable
  • Colored fires
  • Clipped
  • Can’t light fires in Bank
  • Can click logs on the ground and light them

Woodcutting:

  • Stumps and regrowing trees
  • Correct hatchet finding
  • Correct hatchet animations
  • All trees cut-able
  • Correct fell chance algorithms
  • Birds nest falling out
  • Broken axe random event
  • Spirit Tree
  • Canoes

Mining:

  • Emptying and refilling rocks
  • All ores can be mined
  • Correct pickaxe finding and animations
  • Prospecting
  • Random chance of obtaining gems
  • Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
  • Mining gems at shilo village
  • Mining granite and sandstone (1kg/2kg/5kg/10kg)
  • Rock Golem

Fletching:

  • All logs can be fletched
  • Correct interfaces
  • Fletch 5, 10, x, all

Crafting:

  • Gem cutting
  • Tanning
  • Spinning & Picking flax
  • Pottery
  • Jewelry Molding

Thieving:

  • Stall Thieving
  • NPC Thieving
  • Correct anims & gfx
  • Correct Respawn Times

Fishing:

  • All fishing spots
  • All fishes fishable
  • Correct equipment
  • Correct animations
  • Moving locations, probably not going to add

Cooking:

  • All fishes cookable
  • All meat cookable
  • Pizzas, cakes, pies, stews.
  • Cooking gauntlets
  • Correct anims & delays
  • Working interface with multiple amount options
  • Lumbridge cooking range bonus
  • Eating food
  • Wine

Runecrafting:

  • Altar Enterting
  • Tiaras
  • All Altars
  • Abyss

Herblore:

  • All potions makeable
  • Itentifying herbs
  • Weapon poisioning

Smithing:

  • All bars smithable
  • Smelting
  • Correct anims, working interfaces & objects

Slayer:

  • All Slayer Masters
  • All Slayer Monsters
  • Basic Slayer Gem
  • Slayer Points
  • Slayer Shop

To do:

-Farming, most of it
-Adding a custom owner crown
-Adding a custom developpers crown
-Adding a custom moderator crown
-Adding a custom administrator crown

Combat:

-Project Insanity Combat with many fixes and Add-Ons.
-Perfect Range Formula
-Melee Max hit Formula Tweaked

Bosses:

-Big Wolf
-Chaos Elemental
-Count Draynor
-Dagganoth Supreme
-Dagganoth Rex
-Dagganoth Prime
-Giant Mole
-Gunthor the Brave
-Kalphite Queen
-King Black Dragon
-TzTok-Jad

Minigames:

-Duel Arena
-Castle Wars
-Fight Caves
-Barrows
[color=green]-Fight Pits[/color]
-Pest Control
-Fishing Trawler
-Gnome Ball
-Bar crawl
-Blast Furnace
-Champion’s Challenge
-Chompy hunting
-Games room
-Jungle Clean Up
-Pet Care
-Rogue Trader
-Rogue’s Den
-Splitbark Armour
-Temple Trekking
-Magic Training Arena

Random Events:

-Broken axe random
-Bird Nests
-Sand which Lady
-Genie
-Rock Golem)
-Spirit Tree
-Zombie
-Evil Chicken

Quests:

-Cook’s Assistant
-Romeo and Juliet
-Witches Potion
-Imp Catcher
-Dorics Quest
-Vampyre Slayer
-Restless Ghost
-Gertrude’s Cat
-Sheep Shearer
-Rune Mysteries
-Tutorial island added (Npcs, dialogues, doors, all tasks, etc)

Membership:

  • Member objects
  • One time fee $ 7.50 dollars.
  • Members only teleports
  • Members items
  • Pre alpha/Beta will be free
  • Members/Non Members Skills

Miscellaneous:

-97 % of runescape spawns includes (fish spots, all shops, all main cities, and more)
-100 % of runescape shops (111 shops loaded)
-99.9 % of dupes fixed (If there are any left they will be fixed asap)
-90 % + all skills to be done
-99 % of runescape foods added
-97 % of all doors around the world (Will be adding the rest when found)
-99 % potions (All should be added may be missing one or two)
-95 % runescape drops (Will find bugs in beta testing phase)
-All guilds openable with requirements
-Wilderness warning sign
-Normal and Ancient Magics (No lunars because it wasn’t in 2006)
-Exact Runescape Teleports (Gives exp, requires runes, requires levels, misc teleport, requires member for ancients and some moderns, and more…)
-Old Runescape Starter
-Runescape price rip
-Adding Quests Exactly like Runescape
-Report Abuse
-Runescape like Sailing with all locations
-Full Gnome Glider Transportation
-Bank Pins
-Christmas Crackers
-Fully Functional Teletabs
-Full Pickables (Cabbage, Flax, Wheat, Onions, Potato, Etc…)
-Full Weapon Poisioning
-Many, May, Bugs fixed
-Add or Drop Item Function (If you don’t have enough room it goes on the ground)
-Chat Filtering System
-Fully Functional 99 % Skill Guides
-Hostname Blacklist Implemented
-Al Kharid Gates and Shantay Pass
-Running with Energy (Will have weight soon)
-Runescape Combat Exp Rates
-Magic Carpet
-Ladder System
-Rings that will be ingame (Dueling, Wealth, Recoil) (Life)
-Amulets that will be ingame (Glory, Games Necklace, Ghostspeak Amulet)
-Clue scrolls (Tons of scrolls loaded)
-Hide Tanning
-Canoes
-Music Player
-Teletabs
-Looping animations added (Don’t stop half way through)
-Random Events
-Crystal Chest
-Flax Stringing
-Aubury
-Clipped Npcs (Walking, Following) (Attacking)
-Clipped Following
-Full emptying system (Jugs, Vials, Buckets, etc)

  • Water Filables added (Buckets, jugs, vials, bowls, waterskins, etc)
  • Perfect Magic Enchanting added
  • Al Kharid Desert Added
  • Great Membership system Countdown/Members/Non members Items
  • Teleporting to Zanaris with Dramen staff in Inventory or equipped
  • Pets System Added
  • Global Drops

More soon to come!

Read full topic
